Text.Page:
So now you're taking on the naga and mekonari conspiracy. I'm impressed.

I've been giving it a lot of thought, , and I think the {@LinkCreature:42#1100#nickar enchantresses} could be part of this. If you find anything while you're busy killing things, let Vries know.

A translation? Certainly....

"Resurrect our lord Dagon...." Not surprising, that. "...offerings of blood...sacrifice...source of arcane power...."

By Karas, could they actually do this?

Go to Darimâ€”he's a good thinker, and our best strategist. Tell him what it says here. He'll devise a plan.
Have you faced the {@LinkCreature:42#1100#nickar enchantresses} yet? Do you have anything?

Dagon. Dear Kaia...!

The nagas are bad enough, but if they brought back Dagon, there'd be no place to hide. Every town in the region would be ash.

And us, too.
